lead_paragraph: Donald J. Trump’s post on Twitter suggested that Boeing’s pitch may have swayed him to buy more of its F-18s over Lockheed Martin’s F-35s.

headline.print_headline: More Pressure on Lockheed to Cut Price of Fighters
headline.main: Trump Pits Boeing Against Lockheed to Cut Costs of New Fighter Jets

snippet: Donald J. Trump’s post on Twitter suggested that Boeing’s pitch may have swayed him to buy more of its F-18s over Lockheed Martin’s F-35s....
abstract: Pres-elect Donald Trump posts statement on Twitter pressuring Lockheed Martin to lower price of F-35 fighter jet; says he has asked rival company Boeing to give price for 'comparable' version of its F-18 Super Hornet.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
